00036 float ArabCalc::Calculate(){
00037         float hasil;
00038         if(mode == 1)
00039     {
00040                 hasil = CalculatePrefix();
00041         }
00042         else if(mode == 2)
00043         {
00044                 hasil = CalculateInfix();
00045         }
00046         else if(mode == 3)
00047         {
00048                 hasil = CalculatePostfix();
00049         }
00050         return hasil;
00051 }

00057 void ArabCalc::SmallCalculate(Stack<float> &bil,Stack<string> &operatorx)
00058 {
00059         float popbil1;
00060         float popbil2;
00061         string dumpoperator;
00062         float dumpbil;
00063         popbil1 = bil.getLastData();
00064         bil>>dumpbil;
00065         popbil2 = bil.getLastData();
00066         bil>>dumpbil;
00067         string popoperator = operatorx.getLastData();
00068         operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00069         if(popoperator == "*")
00070         {
00071                 bil<< popbil2*popbil1;
00072         }
00073         else if(popoperator == ":")
00074         {
00075                 bil<< popbil2/popbil1;
00076         }
00077         else if(popoperator == "/")
00078         {
00079                 int a = (int) floor(popbil2/popbil1 + 0.5);
00080                 bil<< a;
00081         }
00082         else if(popoperator == "%")
00083         {
00084                 int tempint1 = (int) floor(popbil1 + 0.5);
00085                 int tempint2 = (int) floor(popbil2 + 0.5);
00086                 float hasil = (float)(tempint2%tempint1);
00087                 bil<< hasil;
00088         }
00089 
00090         else if(popoperator == "+")
00091         {
00092                 bil<< popbil2+popbil1;
00093         }
00094         else if(popoperator == "-")
00095         {
00096                 bil<< popbil2-popbil1;
00097         }
00098 }

00104 float ArabCalc::CalculateInfix(){
00105         string dumpoperator;
00106         float dumpbil;
00107         float hasil;
00108         string ekspresitemp = ekspresi;
00109         while(ekspresitemp.length() != 0)
00110         {
00111                 char *temp =  new char[30];
00112                 int isCompleteRead = 0;
00113                 int ctemp = 0;
00114                 while(ekspresitemp[0] == '0' || ekspresitemp[0] == '1' || ekspresitemp[0] == '2' || ekspresitemp[0] == '3' || ekspresitemp[0] == '4' || ekspresitemp[0] == '5'
00115                 || ekspresitemp[0] == '6'|| ekspresitemp[0] == '7' || ekspresitemp[0] == '8' || ekspresitemp[0] == '9' || ekspresitemp[0] == '.')
00116                 {
00117                         temp[ctemp] = ekspresitemp[0];
00118                         ekspresitemp.erase(0,1);
00119                         ctemp++;
00120                         isCompleteRead = 1;
00121                 }
00122                 if(isCompleteRead == 1)
00123                 {
00124                         bil<< atof(temp);
00125                 }
00126                 if(ekspresitemp[0] == '+' || ekspresitemp[0] == '-' || ekspresitemp[0] == '*' || ekspresitemp[0] == ':' || ekspresitemp[0] == '/' || ekspresitemp[0] == '%' || ekspresitemp[0] == '('|| ekspresitemp[0] == ')')
00127                 {
00128                         if(operatorx.isEmpty() || ekspresitemp[0] == '(')
00129                         {
00130                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00131 
00132                         }
00133                         else
00134                         {
00135                                 if(ekspresitemp[0] == '+' || ekspresitemp[0] == '-')
00136                                 {
00137                                         if(operatorx.getLastData() == "*" || operatorx.getLastData() == ":"|| operatorx.getLastData() == "/" || operatorx.getLastData() == "%" || operatorx.getLastData() == "+" || operatorx.getLastData() == "-")

00149                                 {
00150 
00151                                         if(operatorx.getLastData() == "*" || operatorx.getLastData() == "/" || operatorx.getLastData() == ":"  || operatorx.getLastData() == "%")

00166                                         }

00172                 }
00173         }
00174         while(!operatorx.isEmpty())
00175         {
00176                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00177 
00178         }
00179         hasil = bil.getLastData();
00180         //Cleaning
00181         while(!bil.isEmpty())
00182         {
00183                 bil>>dumpbil;
00184         }
00185         while(!operatorx.isEmpty())
00186         {
00187                 operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00188         }
00189         return hasil;
00190 }

00196 float ArabCalc::CalculatePrefix() {
00197     char buffer[15];
00198     int i, len, j;
00199     float op1, op2, x;
00200     Stack<float> s;
00201         float dumpfloat;
00202     len = ekspresi.length();
00203     j = 0;
00204     for(i=len-1; i>=0; i--){
00205 
00206         if((ekspresi[i]>='0' && ekspresi[i]<='9') || ekspresi[i]<='.'){
00207             buffer[j++] = ekspresi[i];
00208         }
00209         else if(ekspresi[i]==' '){
00210             if(j>0){
00211                 buffer[j] = '\0';
00212                 x = atof(buffer);
00213                 s<<x;
00214                 j = 0;
00215             }
00216         }
00217         else if(ekspresi[i]=='+' || ekspresi[i]=='-' || ekspresi[i]=='*' || ekspresi[i]==':' || ekspresi[i]=='%' || ekspresi[i]=='/'){
00218             op1 = s.getLastData();
00219             s>>dumpfloat;
00220             op2 = s.getLastData();
00221             s>>dumpfloat;
00222             switch(ekspresi[i]){
00223                 case '+':
00224                     s<<op2 + op1;
00225                     break;
00226                 case '-':
00227                     s<<(op2 - op1);
00228                     break;
00229                 case '*':
00230                     s<<(op2 * op1);
00231                     break;
00232                 case ':':
00233                     s<<(op2 / op1);
00234                     break;
00235                 case '%': // di c++ nggak bisa float mod float
00236                     while (op2 >= op1) {
00237                         op2 = op2 - op1;
00238                     }
00239                     s<<(op2);
00240                     break;
00241                 case '/':
00242                     int div;
00243                     div = (int)floor(op2 / op1);
00244                     s<<(div);
00245                     break;
00246             }
00247         }
00248     }
00249     return s.getLastData();
00250 }

00256 float ArabCalc::CalculatePostfix() {
00257     char buffer[15];
00258     int i, len, j;
00259     float op1, op2, x;
00260     Stack<float> s;
00261     len = ekspresi.length();
00262     j = 0;
00263         float dumpfloat;
00264     for(i=0; i<len;i++){
00265 
00266         if((ekspresi[i]>='0' && ekspresi[i]<='9') || ekspresi[i]<='.'){
00267             buffer[j++] = ekspresi[i];
00268         }
00269         else if(ekspresi[i]==' '){
00270             if(j>0){
00271                 buffer[j] = '\0';
00272                 x = atoi(buffer);
00273                 s<<x;
00274                 j = 0;
00275             }
00276         }

00278             op1 = s.getLastData();
00279             s>>dumpfloat;
00280             op2 = s.getLastData();

00283                 case '+':
00284                     s<<(op2 + op1);

00299                     s<<(op2);
